column4: i am unable to do any updates on my Jaunty box.. apt-get update gives a "Failed to Fetch" line for each repo and then states "Some index files failed to download, they have been ignored, or old ones used instead.".  Changing Software Sources doesn't help either.  I've tried over 10 different servers now.
can you use http://pastebin.com to provide the output of: sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
i tried a few and I dont get a connection either. last one I tried was: http://mirror.cps.cmich.edu/ubuntu/dists/jaunty-updates/multiverse/binary-i386/Packages   let me dig
